definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: But the office grasps the seriousness of its role.
sentences.chinese: 但译名室的人理解其工作的严肃性所在。

sentences.english: This article discusses the accuracy in translating some Anglo American terms into Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述英美国俗术语译名的准确性问题。

sentences.english: The success or failure of trademark translated version has a direct effect on the sale of the product.
sentences.chinese: 商标译名成功与否直接影响产品的销售。

definition: meaning (of foreign expression)/translation of the meaning (as opposed to literal translation 直譯|直译)/paraphrase/free translation
name (of a person or thing)/CL:個|个[ge4]

transliteration (rendering phonetic value, e.g. of English words in Chinese characters)/characters giving phonetic value of Chinese word or name (when the correct characters may be unknown)/transcription (linguistics)/to transcribe phonetic symbols
name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
translated word (such as company 公司 or bus 巴士 or club 俱樂部|俱乐部)
